title: ERROR validator: Could not request attestation to sign at slot error=rpc
body:
Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS

Running ETH1 Node, Beacon Chain and Validator

I'm getting this error on my Validator:


Starting Prysm validator --tls-cert=ca.cert --monitoring-host 0.0.0.0 --beacon-rpc-provider 127.0.0.1:4000 --graffiti ETH to the moon
[2020-08-23 13:34:46]  INFO accounts-v2: (wallet path) /home/desktop/.eth2validators/prysm-wallet-v2
[2020-08-23 13:34:46]  INFO accounts-v2: (wallet directory) /home/desktop/.eth2validators/prysm-wallet-v2
Wallet password: 
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO node: Validating for public key pubKey=0x89c5fa579ddf
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO node: Checking DB databasePath=/home/desktop/.eth2
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO node: Starting validator node version=Prysm/v1.0.0-alpha.23/0a5ec502b0207c0a39484fa29331fabb351858e7. Built at: 2020-08-18 04:14:07+00:00
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO gateway: Starting gRPC gateway address=127.0.0.1:7500
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO validator: Established secure gRPC connection
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO rpc: gRPC server listening on address address=127.0.0.1:7000
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO validator: Waiting for beacon chain start log from the ETH 1.0 deposit contract
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO validator: Beacon chain started genesisTime=2020-08-04 06:00:08 -0700 PDT
[2020-08-23 13:34:53]  INFO validator: Validator activated index=28145 publicKey=0x89c5fa579ddf
[2020-08-23 13:34:53] ERROR validator: rpc error: code = DeadlineExceeded desc = context deadline exceeded
[2020-08-23 13:34:53] ERROR validator: Failed to update assignments error=rpc error: code = DeadlineExceeded desc = context deadline exceeded
[2020-08-23 13:34:59]  INFO validator: Attestation schedule attesters=1 pubKeys=[0x89c5fa579ddf] slot=139079
[2020-08-23 13:36:08] ERROR validator: Could not request attestation to sign at slot error=rpc error: code = DeadlineExceeded desc = context deadline exceeded pubKey=0x89c5fa579ddf slot=139079
[2020-08-23 13:40:59]  INFO validator: Previous epoch aggregated voting summary attestationInclusionPct=0% correctlyVotedHeadPct=NaN% correctlyVotedSourcePct=NaN% correctlyVotedTargetPct=NaN% epoch=4346
[2020-08-23 13:40:59]  INFO validator: Vote summary since launch attestationsInclusionPct=0% averageInclusionDistance=NaN slots correctlyVotedHeadPct=NaN% correctlyVotedSourcePct=NaN% correctlyVotedTargetPct=NaN% numberOfEpochs=1 pctChangeCombinedBalance=0.00000%
[2020-08-23 13:41:10]  INFO validator: Attestation schedule attesters=1 pubKeys=[0x89c5fa579ddf] slot=139107
[2020-08-23 13:41:44] ERROR validator: Could not request attestation to sign at slot error=rpc error: code = DeadlineExceeded desc = context deadline exceeded pubKey=0x89c5fa579ddf slot=139107
context deadline exceeds when the validator first loads up is ok, it should work after that. Please reopen this if it persists
